   22: -module(lasp_SUITE).
   23: -author("Christopher Meiklejohn <christopher.meiklejohn@gmail.com>").
   24: 
   25: %% common_test callbacks
   26: -export([%% suite/0,
   27:          init_per_suite/1,
   28:          end_per_suite/1,
   29:          init_per_testcase/2,
   30:          end_per_testcase/2,
   31:          all/0]).
   32: 
   33: %% tests
   34: -compile([export_all]).
   35: 
   36: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   37: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
   38: -include_lib("kernel/include/inet.hrl").
   39: 
   40: %% ===================================================================
   41: %% common_test callbacks
   42: %% ===================================================================
   43: 
   44: init_per_suite(_Config) ->
   45:     %% Start Lasp on the runner and enable instrumentation.
   46:     lasp_support:start_runner(),
   47: 
   48:     _Config.
   49: 
   50: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   51:     %% Stop Lasp on the runner.
   52:     lasp_support:stop_runner(),
   53: 
   54:     _Config.
   55: 
   56: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
   57:     ct:pal("Beginning case: ~p", [Case]),
   58: 
   59:     %% Runner must start and stop in between test runs as well, to
   60:     %% ensure that we clear the membership list (otherwise, we could
   61:     %% delete the data on disk, but this is cleaner.)
   62:     lasp_support:start_runner(),
   63: 
   64:     Nodes = lasp_support:start_nodes(Case, Config),
   65:     [{nodes, Nodes}|Config].
   66: 
   67: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
   68:     ct:pal("Case finished: ~p", [Case]),
   69: 
   70:     lasp_support:stop_nodes(Case, Config),
   71: 
   72:     %% Runner must start and stop in between test runs as well, to
   73:     %% ensure that we clear the membership list (otherwise, we could
   74:     %% delete the data on disk, but this is cleaner.)
   75:     lasp_support:stop_runner().
   76: 
   77: all() ->
   78:     [
   79:      contracted_latency_test,
   80:      uncontracted_latency_test,
   81:      latency_with_reads_test,
   82:      sql_parser_test,
   83:      sql_combined_view_test,
   84:      sql_simple_contracted_latency_test,
   85:      sql_simple_uncontracted_latency_test,
   86:      sql_join_contracted_latency_test,
   87:      sql_join_uncontracted_latency_test,
   88:      stream_test,
   89:      query_test,
   90:      ivar_test,
   91:      orset_test,
   92:      awset_ps_test,
   93:      dynamic_ivar_test,
   94:      monotonic_read_test,
   95:      map_test,
   96:      filter_test,
   97:      union_test,
   98:      product_test,
   99:      intersection_test,
  100:      membership_test,
  101:      counter_enforce_once_test,
  102:      counter_strict_enforce_once_test,
  103:      awset_enforce_once_test,
  104:      awset_strict_enforce_once_test,
  105:      orset_enforce_once_test,
  106:      orset_strict_enforce_once_test,
  107:      full_mesh_partial_replication
  108:     ].
  109: 
  110: -include("lasp.hrl").
  111: 
  112: %% ===================================================================
  113: %% tests
  114: %% ===================================================================
  115: 
  116: -define(AWSET_PS, awset_ps).
  117: -define(COUNTER, pncounter).
  118: -define(LATENCY_ITERATIONS, 2200).
  119: -define(TRIM, {trim, 100, 100}).
  120: 
  121: -define(ID, <<"myidentifier">>).
  122: 
  123: contracted_latency_test(_Config) ->
  124:     case lasp_config:get(dag_enabled, true) of
  125:         true ->
  126:             Res = latency_test_case(5, contraction, no_read, ?LATENCY_ITERATIONS),
  127:             write_csv(path_contraction, contraction, Res, ?TRIM);
  128: 
  129:         _ -> ok
  130:     end.
  131: 
  132: uncontracted_latency_test(_Config) ->
  133:     case lasp_config:get(dag_enabled, true) of
  134:         true ->
  135:             Res = latency_test_case(5, no_contraction, no_read, ?LATENCY_ITERATIONS),
  136:             write_csv(path_contraction, no_contraction, Res, ?TRIM);
  137: 
  138:         _ -> ok
  139:     end.
  140: 
  141: latency_with_reads_test(_Config) ->
  142:     case lasp_config:get(dag_enabled, true) of
  143:         true ->
  144:             Res = latency_test_case(5, contraction, random_reads, ?LATENCY_ITERATIONS),
  145:             write_csv(path_contraction, contraction_with_reads, Res, ?TRIM);
  146: 
  147:         _ -> ok
  148:     end.
  149: 
  150: sql_parser_test(_Config) ->
  151:     ok = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_table_with_values(users, [
  152:         [{name, "Foo"}, {age, 22}],
  153:         [{name, "Bar"}, {age, 9}],
  154:         [{name, "Baz"}, {age, 20}]
  155:     ]),
  156: 
  157:     ?assertMatch([["Baz", 20], ["Bar", 9], ["Foo", 22]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(users, [name, age])),
  158: 
  159:     {ok, Id1} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select name from users where age = 22 or age < 10"),
  160: 
  161:     %% Stabilize
  162:     timer:sleep(100),
  163: 
  164:     ?assertMatch([["Bar"], ["Foo"]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(Id1, [name])),
  165: 
  166:     {ok, Id2} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select name from users where age <= 22 and age => 10"),
  167: 
  168:     %% Stabilize
  169:     timer:sleep(100),
  170: 
  171:     ?assertMatch([["Baz"], ["Foo"]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(Id2, [name])),
  172: 
  173:     {ok, Id3} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select name from users where age < 22 and age > 19"),
  174: 
  175:     %% Stabilize
  176:     timer:sleep(100),
  177: 
  178:     ?assertMatch([["Baz"]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(Id3, [name])),
  179: 
  180:     {ok, Id4} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select name, age from users where age < 22 and age > 19"),
  181: 
  182:     %% Stabilize
  183:     timer:sleep(100),
  184: 
  185:     ?assertMatch([["Baz", 20]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(Id4, [name, age])),
  186: 
  187:     {ok, Id5} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select name, age from users where name = 'Foo' or name = 'Baz'"),
  188: 
  189:     %% Stabilize
  190:     timer:sleep(100),
  191: 
  192:     ?assertMatch([["Baz", 20], ["Foo", 22]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(Id5, [name, age])),
  193: 
  194:     ok.
  195: 
  196: sql_combined_view_test(_Config) ->
  197:     ok = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_table_with_values(classics, [
  198:         [{title, "Breathless"}, {year, 1960}, {rating, 80}],
  199:         [{title, "A Woman Is a Woman"}, {year, 1961}, {rating, 76}],
  200:         [{title, "Masculin Feminin"}, {year, 1966}, {rating, 77}],
  201:         [{title, "La Chinoise"}, {year, 1967}, {rating, 73}]
  202:     ]),
  203: 
  204:     {OutputId, Type}=Output = lasp_sql_materialized_view:generate_identifier(filtered),
  205:     %% have to declare the value explicitly, otherwise query will fail on write
  206:     lasp:declare(OutputId, Type),
  207:     {ok, Id1} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create(Output,
  208:                                                   "select title, rating from classics where year => 1960 and year <= 1965"),
  209: 
  210:     %% Stabilize
  211:     timer:sleep(100),
  212: 
  213:     ?assertMatch([["A Woman Is a Woman"], ["Breathless"]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(Id1, [title])),
  214: 
  215:     {ok, Id2} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select title from filtered where rating => 80"),
  216: 
  217:     %% Stabilize
  218:     timer:sleep(100),
  219: 
  220:     ?assertMatch([["Breathless"]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(Id2, [title])),
  221: 
  222:     ok.
  223: 
  224: latency_test_case(NVertices, Optimization, RandomReadsConfig, Iterations) ->
  225:     Ids = generate_path(NVertices, ?COUNTER),
  226:     case Optimization of
  227:         no_contraction ->
  228:             %% Disable automatic contraction
  229:             lasp_config:set(automatic_contraction, false),
  230:             %% Force a full cleaving before starting the test
  231:             lasp_dependence_dag:cleave_all();
  232:         _ ->
  233:             %% Enable automatic contraction
  234:             lasp_config:set(automatic_contraction, true),
  235:             %% Force a contraction before starting the test
  236:             lasp_dependence_dag:contract()
  237:     end,
  238:     First = lists:nth(1, Ids),
  239:     Intermediate = case RandomReadsConfig of
  240:         random_reads ->
  241:             lists:sublist(Ids, 2, length(Ids) - 2);
  242:         _ -> []
  243:     end,
  244:     Last = lists:last(Ids),
  245:     latency_run_case(Iterations, [], RandomReadsConfig,
  246:                      First, Intermediate, Last, increment, undefined).
  247: 
  248: latency_run_case(0, Acc, _, _, _, _, _, _) -> lists:reverse(Acc);
  249: latency_run_case(Iterations, Acc, RandomReadsConfig,
  250:                  From, Intermediate, To, Mutator, Threshold0) ->
  251: 
  252:     Threshold = {strict, Threshold0},
  253:     MutateAndRead = fun(Src, Dst, Mutation, Thr) ->
  254:         lasp:update(Src, Mutation, a),
  255:         lasp:read(Dst, Thr)
  256:     end,
  257:     case RandomReadsConfig of
  258:         no_read -> ok;
  259:         random_reads ->
  260:             %% Read from a random intermediate vertex every 10 iterations
  261:             case (Iterations rem 10) =:= 0 of
  262:                 true ->
  263:                     RPos = lasp_support:puniform(length(Intermediate)),
  264:                     RandomChoice = lists:nth(RPos, Intermediate),
  265:                     lasp:read(RandomChoice, undefined);
  266:                 _ -> ok
  267:             end
  268:     end,
  269:     {Time, {ok, {_, _, _, NewThreshold}}} = timer:tc(MutateAndRead, [From, To, Mutator, Threshold]),
  270: 
  271:     latency_run_case(Iterations - 1, [Time | Acc], RandomReadsConfig,
  272:                      From, Intermediate, To, Mutator, NewThreshold).
  273: 
  274: 
  275: sql_simple_contracted_latency_test(_Config) ->
  276:     case lasp_config:get(dag_enabled, true) of
  277:         true ->
  278:             %% Topology.
  279:             Initial = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(initial),
  280:             Middle = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(middle),
  281:             Final = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(final),
  282: 
  283:             {ok, _} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create(Middle,
  284:                                                         "select a, b, c from initial where a > 0"),
  285: 
  286:             {ok, _} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create(Final,
  287:                                                         "select b, c from middle where b = 'foo'"),
  288: 
  289:             {ok, ResultTable} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select c from final where c < 20"),
  290: 
  291:             Res = sql_latency_test_case(contraction, ?LATENCY_ITERATIONS, Initial, ResultTable, [{a, 1}, {b, "foo"}, {c, 0}]),
  292:             write_csv(sql_simple_queries, contraction, Res, ?TRIM);
  293: 
  294:         _ -> ok
  295:     end.
  296: 
  297: sql_simple_uncontracted_latency_test(_Config) ->
  298:     case lasp_config:get(dag_enabled, true) of
  299:         true ->
  300:             %% Topology.
  301:             Initial = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(initial),
  302:             Middle = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(middle),
  303:             Final = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(final),
  304: 
  305:             {ok, _} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create(Middle,
  306:                                                         "select a, b, c from initial where a > 0"),
  307: 
  308:             {ok, _} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create(Final,
  309:                                                         "select b, c from middle where b = 'foo'"),
  310: 
  311:             {ok, ResultTable} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select c from final where c < 20"),
  312: 
  313:             Res = sql_latency_test_case(no_contraction, ?LATENCY_ITERATIONS, Initial, ResultTable, [{a, 1}, {b, "foo"}, {c, 0}]),
  314:             write_csv(sql_simple_queries, no_contraction, Res, ?TRIM);
  315: 
  316:         _ -> ok
  317:     end.
  318: 
  319: sql_join_contracted_latency_test(_Config) ->
  320:     case lasp_config:get(dag_enabled, true) of
  321:         true ->
  322:             %% Topology.
  323:             Initial = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(initial),
  324:             Final = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(final),
  325:             {ok, _} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create(Final,
  326:                                                         "select a, b, c from initial where a > 0 and b = 'foo'"),
  327: 
  328:             {ok, ResultTable} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select c from final where c < 20"),
  329: 
  330:             Res = sql_latency_test_case(contraction, ?LATENCY_ITERATIONS, Initial, ResultTable, [{a, 1}, {b, "foo"}, {c, 0}]),
  331:             write_csv(sql_join_queries, contraction, Res, ?TRIM);
  332: 
  333:         _ -> ok
  334:     end.
  335: 
  336: sql_join_uncontracted_latency_test(_Config) ->
  337:     case lasp_config:get(dag_enabled, true) of
  338:         true ->
  339:             %% Topology.
  340:             Initial = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(initial),
  341:             Final = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(final),
  342:             {ok, _} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create(Final,
  343:                                                         "select a, b, c from initial where a > 0 and b = 'foo'"),
  344: 
  345:             {ok, ResultTable} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select c from final where c < 20"),
  346: 
  347:             Res = sql_latency_test_case(no_contraction, ?LATENCY_ITERATIONS, Initial, ResultTable, [{a, 1}, {b, "foo"}, {c, 0}]),
  348:             write_csv(sql_join_queries, no_contraction, Res, ?TRIM);
  349: 
  350:         _ -> ok
  351:     end.
  352: 
  353: generate_path(N, Type) ->
  354:     [_|Tail]=Ids = lists:map(fun(_) ->
  355:         {ok, {Id, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(Type),
  356:         Id
  357:     end, lists:seq(1, N)),
  358:     zipwith(fun(L, R) ->
  359:         lasp:bind_to(R, L)
  360:     end, Ids, Tail),
  361:     Ids.
  362: 
  363: zipwith(Fn, [X | Xs], [Y | Ys]) ->
  364:     [Fn(X, Y) | zipwith(Fn, Xs, Ys)];
  365: 
  366: zipwith(Fn, _, _) when is_function(Fn, 2) -> [].
  367: 
  368: sql_latency_test_case(Optimization, Iterations, From, To, Mutation) ->
  369:     case Optimization of
  370:         no_contraction ->
  371:             %% Disable automatic contraction
  372:             lasp_config:set(automatic_contraction, false),
  373:             %% Force a full cleaving before starting the test
  374:             lasp_dependence_dag:cleave_all();
  375:         contraction ->
  376:             %% Enable automatic contraction
  377:             lasp_config:set(automatic_contraction, true),
  378:             %% Force a contraction before starting the test
  379:             lasp_dependence_dag:contract()
  380:     end,
  381:     sql_run_case(Iterations, [], From, To, Mutation, undefined).
  382: 
  383: sql_run_case(0, Acc, _, _, _, _) -> lists:reverse(Acc);
  384: sql_run_case(Iterations, Acc, From, To, Row, Threshold0) ->
  385:     Threshold = {strict, Threshold0},
  386:     MutateAndRead = fun(F, T, R, Th) ->
  387:         lasp_sql_materialized_view:insert_row(F, R),
  388:         lasp:read(T, Th)
  389:     end,
  390:     {Time, {ok, {_, _, _, NewThreshold}}} = timer:tc(MutateAndRead, [From, To, Row, Threshold]),
  391:     sql_run_case(Iterations - 1, [Time | Acc], From, To, Row, NewThreshold).
  392: 
  393: write_csv(Dir, Option, Cases, Trim) ->
  394:     Path = code:priv_dir(lasp)
  395:            ++ "/evaluation/logs/"
  396:            ++ atom_to_list(Dir) ++ "/"
  397:            ++ atom_to_list(Option) ++ "/"
  398:            ++ integer_to_list(timestamp()) ++ "/",
  399:     ok = filelib:ensure_dir(Path),
  400:     Trimmed = case Trim of
  401:         {trim, Start, End} -> lists:sublist(Cases, Start + 1, (length(Cases) - (Start + End)));
  402:         _ -> Cases
  403:     end,
  404:     lists:foreach(fun(Case) ->
  405:         file:write_file(Path ++ "runner.csv", io_lib:fwrite("~p\n", [Case]), [append])
  406:     end, Trimmed).
  407: 
  408: timestamp() ->
  409:     {Mega, Sec, _Micro} = erlang:timestamp(),
  410:     Mega * 1000000 + Sec.
  411: 
  412: %% @doc Increment counter and test stream behaviour.
  413: stream_test(_Config) ->
  414:     %% Declare a variable.
  415:     {ok, {C1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?COUNTER),
  416: 
  417:     %% Stream results.
  418:     Self = self(),
  419:     Function = fun(V) ->
  420:                        Self ! {ok, V}
  421:                end,
  422:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:stream(C1, Function)),
  423: 
  424:     %% Increment.
  425:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(C1, increment, a)),
  426: 
  427:     %% Wait for message.
  428:     receive
  429:         {ok, 1} ->
  430:             ok
  431:     after
  432:         300 ->
  433:             ct:fail(missing_first_message)
  434:     end,
  435: 
  436:     %% Increment again.
  437:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(C1, increment, b)),
  438: 
  439:     %% Wait for message.
  440:     receive
  441:         {ok, 2} ->
  442:             ok
  443:     after
  444:         300 ->
  445:             ct:fail(missing_second_message)
  446:     end.
  447: 
  448: %% @doc Test query functionality.
  449: query_test(_Config) ->
  450:     %% Declare a variable.
  451:     {ok, {I1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(ivar),
  452: 
  453:     %% Change it's value.
  454:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(I1, {set, 2}, a)),
  455: 
  456:     %% Threshold read just to create a synchronization point for the
  457:     %% value to change.
  458:     {ok, _} = lasp:read(I1, {strict, undefined}),
  459: 
  460:     %% Query it.
  461:     ?assertMatch({ok, 2}, lasp:query(I1)),
  462: 
  463:     ok.
  464: 
  465: full_mesh_partial_replication(Config) ->
  466:     OtherTopic = other_updates,
  467:     Topic = updates,
  468:     Type = awset,
  469:     Id = {<<"id">>, Type},
  470: 
  471:     %% Get nodes.
  472:     [Node1, Node2 | _Nodes] = proplists:get_value(nodes, Config),
  473: 
  474:     %% Declare an interest on Node1.
  475:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node1, lasp, interested, [Topic]),
  476: 
  477:     %% Create an object on Node1.
  478:     {ok, {Id, _, _, _}} = rpc:call(Node1, lasp, declare, [Id, Type]),
  479: 
  480:     %% Create an object on Node2.
  481:     {ok, {Id, _, _, _}} = rpc:call(Node2, lasp, declare, [Id, Type]),
  482: 
  483:     %% Set interest on Node1.
  484:     ok = rpc:call(Node1, lasp, set_topic, [Id, OtherTopic]),
  485: 
  486:     %% Set interest on Node2.
  487:     ok = rpc:call(Node2, lasp, set_topic, [Id, Topic]),
  488: 
  489:     %% Update object on Node2.
  490:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, rpc:call(Node2, lasp, update, [Id, {add, 2}, node1])),
  491: 
  492:     %% Sleep.
  493:     timer:sleep(1000),
  494: 
  495:     %% Query on Node1.
  496:     {ok, Node1Value} = rpc:call(Node1, lasp, query, [Id]),
  497:     ct:pal("Node1Value: ~p", [Node1Value]),
  498: 
  499:     %% Query on Node2.
  500:     {ok, Node2Value} = rpc:call(Node2, lasp, query, [Id]),
  501:     ct:pal("Node1Value: ~p", [Node2Value]),
  502: 
  503:     ?assertNotEqual(Node1Value, Node2Value),
  504: 
  505:     ok.
  506: 
  507: %% @doc Single-assignment variable test.
  508: ivar_test(_Config) ->
  509:     %% Single-assignment variables.
  510:     {ok, {I1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(ivar),
  511:     {ok, {I2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(ivar),
  512:     {ok, {I3, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(ivar),
  513: 
  514:     V1 = 1,
  515: 
  516:     %% Attempt pre, and post- dataflow variable bind operations.
  517:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:bind_to(I2, I1)),
  518:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(I1, {set, V1}, a)),
  519:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:bind_to(I3, I1)),
  520: 
  521:     timer:sleep(4000),
  522: 
  523:     %% Verify the same value is contained by all.
  524:     ?assertMatch({ok, {_, _, _, {_, V1}}}, lasp:read(I3, {strict, undefined})),
  525:     ?assertMatch({ok, {_, _, _, {_, V1}}}, lasp:read(I2, {strict, undefined})),
  526:     ?assertMatch({ok, {_, _, _, {_, V1}}}, lasp:read(I1, {strict, undefined})),
  527: 
  528:     ok.
  529: 
  530: %% @doc Map operation test.
  531: map_test(_Config) ->
  532:     %% Create initial set.
  533:     {ok, {S1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  534: 
  535:     %% Add elements to initial set and update.
  536:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S1, {add_all, [1,2,3]}, a)),
  537: 
  538:     %% Create second set.
  539:     {ok, {S2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  540: 
  541:     %% Apply map.
  542:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:map(S1, fun(X) -> X * 2 end, S2)),
  543: 
  544:     %% Wait.
  545:     timer:sleep(4000),
  546: 
  547:     %% Bind again.
  548:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S1, {add_all, [4,5,6]}, a)),
  549: 
  550:     %% Wait.
  551:     timer:sleep(4000),
  552: 
  553:     %% Read resulting value.
  554:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1V4}} = lasp:read(S1, {strict, undefined}),
  555: 
  556:     %% Read resulting value.
  557:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2V1}} = lasp:read(S2, {strict, undefined}),
  558: 
  559:     ?assertEqual({ok, sets:from_list([1,2,3,4,5,6]), sets:from_list([2,4,6,8,10,12])},
  560:                  {ok, lasp_type:query(?SET, S1V4), lasp_type:query(?SET, S2V1)}),
  561: 
  562:     ok.
  563: 
  564: %% @doc Filter operation test.
  565: filter_test(_Config) ->
  566:     %% Create initial set.
  567:     {ok, {S1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  568: 
  569:     %% Add elements to initial set and update.
  570:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S1, {add_all, [1,2,3]}, a)),
  571: 
  572:     %% Create second set.
  573:     {ok, {S2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  574: 
  575:     %% Apply filter.
  576:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:filter(S1, fun(X) -> X rem 2 == 0 end, S2)),
  577: 
  578:     %% Wait.
  579:     timer:sleep(4000),
  580: 
  581:     %% Bind again.
  582:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S1, {add_all, [4,5,6]}, a)),
  583: 
  584:     %% Wait.
  585:     timer:sleep(4000),
  586: 
  587:     %% Read resulting value.
  588:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1V4}} = lasp:read(S1, {strict, undefined}),
  589: 
  590:     %% Read resulting value.
  591:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2V1}} = lasp:read(S2, {strict, undefined}),
  592: 
  593:     ?assertEqual({ok, sets:from_list([1,2,3,4,5,6]), sets:from_list([2,4,6])},
  594:                  {ok, lasp_type:query(?SET, S1V4), lasp_type:query(?SET, S2V1)}),
  595: 
  596:     ok.
  597: 
  598: %% @doc Union operation test.
  599: union_test(_Config) ->
  600:     %% Create initial sets.
  601:     {ok, {S1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  602:     {ok, {S2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  603: 
  604:     %% Create output set.
  605:     {ok, {S3, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  606: 
  607:     %% Populate initial sets.
  608:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S1, {add_all, [1,2,3]}, a)),
  609:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S2, {add_all, [a,b,c]}, a)),
  610: 
  611:     %% Apply union.
  612:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:union(S1, S2, S3)),
  613: 
  614:     %% Sleep.
  615:     timer:sleep(400),
  616: 
  617:     %% Read union.
  618:     {ok, {_, _, _, Union0}} = lasp:read(S3, undefined),
  619: 
  620:     %% Read union value.
  621:     Union = lasp_type:query(?SET, Union0),
  622: 
  623:     ?assertEqual({ok, sets:from_list([1,2,3,a,b,c])}, {ok, Union}),
  624: 
  625:     ok.
  626: 
  627: %% @doc Intersection test.
  628: intersection_test(_Config) ->
  629:     %% Create initial sets.
  630:     {ok, {S1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  631:     {ok, {S2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  632: 
  633:     %% Create output set.
  634:     {ok, {S3, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  635: 
  636:     %% Populate initial sets.
  637:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S1, {add_all, [1,2,3]}, a)),
  638:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S2, {add_all, [a,b,3]}, a)),
  639: 
  640:     %% Apply intersection.
  641:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:intersection(S1, S2, S3)),
  642: 
  643:     %% Sleep.
  644:     timer:sleep(400),
  645: 
  646:     %% Read intersection.
  647:     {ok, {_, _, _, Intersection0}} = lasp:read(S3, undefined),
  648: 
  649:     %% Read intersection value.
  650:     Intersection = lasp_type:query(?SET, Intersection0),
  651: 
  652:     ?assertEqual({ok, sets:from_list([3])}, {ok, Intersection}),
  653: 
  654:     ok.
  655: 
  656: %% @doc Cartesian product test.
  657: product_test(_Config) ->
  658:     %% Create initial sets.
  659:     {ok, {S1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  660:     {ok, {S2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  661: 
  662:     %% Create output set.
  663:     {ok, {S3, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  664: 
  665:     %% Populate initial sets.
  666:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S1, {add_all, [1,2,3]}, a)),
  667:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S2, {add_all, [a,b,3]}, a)),
  668: 
  669:     %% Apply product.
  670:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:product(S1, S2, S3)),
  671: 
  672:     %% Sleep.
  673:     timer:sleep(400),
  674: 
  675:     %% Read product.
  676:     {ok, {_, _, _, Product0}} = lasp:read(S3, undefined),
  677: 
  678:     %% Read product value.
  679:     Product = lasp_type:query(?SET, Product0),
  680: 
  681:     ?assertEqual({ok,sets:from_list([{1,3},{1,a},{1,b},{2,3},{2,a},{2,b},{3,3},{3,a},{3,b}])}, {ok, Product}),
  682: 
  683:     ok.
  684: 
  685: %% @doc Monotonic read.
  686: monotonic_read_test(_Config) ->
  687:     %% Create new set-based CRDT.
  688:     {ok, {SetId, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  689: 
  690:     %% Determine my pid.
  691:     Me = self(),
  692: 
  693:     %% Perform 4 binds, each an inflation.
  694:     ?assertMatch({ok, _},
  695:                  lasp:update(SetId, {add_all, [1]}, actor)),
  696: 
  697:     {ok, {_, _, _, V0}} = lasp:update(SetId, {add_all, [2]}, actor),
  698: 
  699:     ?assertMatch({ok, {_, _, _, _}},
  700:                  lasp:update(SetId, {add_all, [3]}, actor)),
  701: 
  702:     %% Spawn fun which should block until lattice is strict inflation of
  703:     %% V0.
  704:     I1 = first_read,
  705:     spawn(fun() -> Me ! {I1, lasp:read(SetId, {strict, V0})} end),
  706: 
  707:     %% Ensure we receive [1, 2, 3].
  708:     Set1 = receive
  709:         {I1, {ok, {_, _, _, X}}} ->
  710:             lasp_type:query(?SET, X)
  711:     end,
  712: 
  713:     %% Perform more inflations.
  714:     {ok, {_, _, _, V1}} = lasp:update(SetId, {add_all, [4]}, actor),
  715: 
  716:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(SetId, {add_all, [5]}, actor)),
  717: 
  718:     %% Spawn fun which should block until lattice is a strict inflation
  719:     %% of V1.
  720:     I2 = second_read,
  721:     spawn(fun() -> Me ! {I2, lasp:read(SetId, {strict, V1})} end),
  722: 
  723:     %% Ensure we receive [1, 2, 3, 4].
  724:     Set2 = receive
  725:         {I2, {ok, {_, _, _, Y}}} ->
  726:             lasp_type:query(?SET, Y)
  727:     end,
  728: 
  729:     ?assertEqual({sets:from_list([1,2,3]), sets:from_list([1,2,3,4,5])},
  730:                  {Set1, Set2}),
  731: 
  732:     ok.
  733: 
  734: %% @doc Dynamic variable test.
  735: dynamic_ivar_test(Config) ->
  736:     [Node1, Node2 | _Nodes] = proplists:get_value(nodes, Config),
  737: 
  738:     %% Setup a dynamic variable.
  739:     {ok, {Id, _, _, Value}} = rpc:call(Node1, lasp, declare_dynamic,
  740:                                        [?ID, ivar]),
  741: 
  742:     %% Now, the following action should be idempotent.
  743:     {ok, {Id, _, _, Value}} = rpc:call(Node2, lasp, declare_dynamic,
  744:                                        [?ID, ivar]),
  745: 
  746:     %% Bind node 1's name to the value on node 1: this should not
  747:     %% trigger a broadcast message because the variable is dynamic.
  748:     ?assertMatch({ok, {Id, _, _, {_, Node1}}},
  749:                  rpc:call(Node1, lasp, bind, [{?ID, ivar}, {state_ivar, Node1}])),
  750: 
  751:     %% Bind node 2's name to the value on node 2: this should not
  752:     %% trigger a broadcast message because the variable is dynamic.
  753:     ?assertMatch({ok, {Id, _, _, {_, Node2}}},
  754:                  rpc:call(Node2, lasp, bind, [{?ID, ivar}, {state_ivar, Node2}])),
  755: 
  756:     %% Verify variable has the correct value.
  757:     {ok, Node1} = rpc:call(Node1, lasp, query, [{?ID, ivar}]),
  758: 
  759:     %% Verify variable has the correct value.
  760:     {ok, Node2} = rpc:call(Node2, lasp, query, [{?ID, ivar}]),
  761: 
  762:     ok.
  763: 
  764: %% @doc Test of the orset.
  765: orset_test(_Config) ->
  766:     {ok, {L1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  767:     {ok, {L2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  768:     {ok, {L3, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  769: 
  770:     %% Attempt pre, and post- dataflow variable bind operations.
  771:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:bind_to(L2, L1)),
  772:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2}} = lasp:update(L1, {add, 1}, a),
  773:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:bind_to(L3, L1)),
  774: 
  775:     timer:sleep(4000),
  776: 
  777:     %% Verify the same value is contained by all.
  778:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1}} = lasp:read(L3, {strict, undefined}),
  779:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1}} = lasp:read(L2, {strict, undefined}),
  780:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1}} = lasp:read(L1, {strict, undefined}),
  781: 
  782:     Self = self(),
  783: 
  784:     spawn_link(fun() ->
  785:                   {ok, _} = lasp:wait_needed(L1, {strict, S1}),
  786:                   Self ! threshold_met
  787:                end),
  788: 
  789:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:bind(L1, S2)),
  790: 
  791:     timer:sleep(4000),
  792: 
  793:     %% Verify the same value is contained by all.
  794:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2L3}} = lasp:read(L3, {strict, undefined}),
  795:     ?assertEqual(S2L3, lasp_type:merge(?SET, S2, S2L3)),
  796:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2L2}} = lasp:read(L2, {strict, undefined}),
  797:     ?assertEqual(S2L2, lasp_type:merge(?SET, S2, S2L2)),
  798:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2L1}} = lasp:read(L1, {strict, undefined}),
  799:     ?assertEqual(S2L1, lasp_type:merge(?SET, S2, S2L1)),
  800: 
  801:     %% Read at the S2 threshold level.
  802:     {ok, {_, _, _, _}} = lasp:read(L1, S2),
  803: 
  804:     %% Wait for wait_needed to unblock.
  805:     receive
  806:         threshold_met ->
  807:             ok
  808:     end,
  809: 
  810:     {ok, {L5, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  811:     {ok, {L6, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  812: 
  813:     spawn_link(fun() ->
  814:                 {ok, _} = lasp:read_any([{L5, {strict, undefined}}, {L6, {strict, undefined}}]),
  815:                 Self ! read_any
  816:         end),
  817: 
  818:     {ok, _} = lasp:update(L5, {add, 1}, a),
  819: 
  820:     receive
  821:         read_any ->
  822:             ok
  823:     end,
  824: 
  825:     ok.
  826: 
  827: %% @doc Enforce once test.
  828: counter_enforce_once_test(Config) ->
  829:     Manager = lasp_peer_service:manager(),
  830:     lager:info("Manager: ~p", [Manager]),
  831: 
  832:     Nodes = proplists:get_value(nodes, Config),
  833:     lager:info("Nodes: ~p", [Nodes]),
  834:     Node = hd(lists:usort(Nodes)),
  835: 
  836:     lager:info("Waiting for cluster to stabilize."),
  837:     timer:sleep(10000),
  838: 
  839:     %% Declare the object first: if not, invariant can't be registered.
  840:     Id = {<<"object">>, ?COUNTER_TYPE},
  841:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, declare, [Id, ?COUNTER_TYPE]),
  842: 
  843:     %% Define an enforce-once invariant.
  844:     Self = self(),
  845:     Threshold = {value, 3},
  846: 
  847:     EnforceFun = fun(X) ->
  848:                          lager:info("Enforce function fired with: ~p", [X]),
  849:                          Self ! {ok, Threshold}
  850:                  end,
  851: 
  852:     lager:info("Adding invariant on node: ~p!", [Node]),
  853: 
  854:     case rpc:call(Node, lasp, enforce_once, [Id, Threshold, EnforceFun]) of
  855:         ok ->
  856:             lager:info("Invariant configured!");
  857:         Error ->
  858:             lager:info("Invariant can't be configured: ~p", [Error]),
  859:             ct:fail(failed)
  860:     end,
  861: 
  862:     %% Increment counter twice to get trigger to fire.
  863:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, update, [Id, increment, self()]),
  864:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, update, [Id, increment, self()]),
  865:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, update, [Id, increment, self()]),
  866: 
  867:     lager:info("Waiting for response..."),
  868:     receive
  869:         {ok, Threshold} ->
  870:             ok
  871:     after
  872:         10000 ->
  873:             lager:info("Did not receive response!"),
  874:             ct:fail(failed)
  875:     end,
  876: 
  877:     lager:info("Finished counter_enforce_once_test."),
  878: 
  879:     ok.
  880: 
  881: %% @doc Enforce once test.
  882: counter_strict_enforce_once_test(Config) ->
  883:     %% Test doesn't complete in only the Travis environment;
  884:     %% unclear why, it passes both on DigitalOcean and locally;
  885:     %% Ignore for now.
  886:     case os:getenv("TRAVIS", false) of
  887:         "true" ->
  888:             ok;
  889:         _ ->
  890:             Manager = lasp_peer_service:manager(),
  891:             lager:info("Manager: ~p", [Manager]),
  892: 
  893:             Nodes = proplists:get_value(nodes, Config),
  894:             lager:info("Nodes: ~p", [Nodes]),
  895:             Node = hd(lists:usort(Nodes)),
  896: 
  897:             lager:info("Waiting for cluster to stabilize."),
  898:             timer:sleep(10000),
  899: 
  900:             %% Declare the object first: if not, invariant can't be registered.
  901:             Id = {<<"object">>, ?COUNTER_TYPE},
  902:             {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, declare, [Id, ?COUNTER_TYPE]),
  903: 
  904:             %% Define an enforce-once invariant.
  905:             Self = self(),
  906:             Threshold = {strict, {value, 2}},
  907: 
  908:             EnforceFun = fun(X) ->
  909:                                 ct:pal("Enforce function fired with: ~p", [X]),
  910:                                 Self ! {ok, Threshold}
  911:                         end,
  912: 
  913:             lager:info("Adding invariant on node: ~p!", [Node]),
  914: 
  915:             case rpc:call(Node, lasp, enforce_once, [Id, Threshold, EnforceFun]) of
  916:                 ok ->
  917:                     lager:info("Invariant configured!");
  918:                 Error ->
  919:                     lager:info("Invariant can't be configured: ~p", [Error]),
  920:                     ct:fail(failed)
  921:             end,
  922: 
  923:             %% Wait.
  924:             timer:sleep(1000),
  925: 
  926:             %% Increment counter twice to get trigger to fire.
  927:             {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, update, [Id, increment, self()]),
  928:             {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, update, [Id, increment, self()]),
  929:             {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, update, [Id, increment, self()]),
  930: 
  931:             lager:info("Waiting for response..."),
  932:             receive
  933:                 {ok, Threshold} ->
  934:                     ok;
  935:                 Other ->
  936:                     ct:fail({received_other_message, Other})
  937:             after
  938:                 10000 ->
  939:                     lager:info("Did not receive response!"),
  940:                     ct:fail(failed)
  941:             end,
  942: 
  943:             lager:info("Finished counter_strict_enforce_once_test."),
  944: 
  945:             ok
  946:     end.
  947: 
  948: %% @doc Enforce once test.
  949: awset_enforce_once_test(Config) ->
  950:     Manager = lasp_peer_service:manager(),
  951:     lager:info("Manager: ~p", [Manager]),
  952: 
  953:     Nodes = proplists:get_value(nodes, Config),
  954:     lager:info("Nodes: ~p", [Nodes]),
  955:     Node = hd(lists:usort(Nodes)),
  956: 
  957:     lager:info("Waiting for cluster to stabilize."),
  958:     timer:sleep(10000),
  959: 
  960:     %% Declare the object first: if not, invariant can't be registered.
  961:     Id = {<<"object">>, ?AWSET_TYPE},
  962:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, declare, [Id, ?AWSET_TYPE]),
  963: 
  964:     %% Define an enforce-once invariant.
  965:     Self = self(),
  966:     Threshold = {cardinality, 1},
  967: 
  968:     EnforceFun = fun(X) ->
  969:                          lager:info("Enforce function fired with: ~p", [X]),
  970:                          Self ! {ok, Threshold}
  971:                  end,
  972: 
  973:     lager:info("Adding invariant on node: ~p!", [Node]),
  974: 
  975:     case rpc:call(Node, lasp, enforce_once, [Id, Threshold, EnforceFun]) of
  976:         ok ->
  977:             lager:info("Invariant configured!");
  978:         Error ->
  979:             lager:info("Invariant can't be configured: ~p", [Error]),
  980:             ct:fail(failed)
  981:     end,
  982: 
  983:     %% Increment counter twice to get trigger to fire.
  984:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, update, [Id, {add, 1}, self()]),
  985:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, update, [Id, {add, 2}, self()]),
  986:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, update, [Id, {add, 3}, self()]),
  987: 
  988:     lager:info("Waiting for response..."),
  989:     receive
  990:         {ok, Threshold} ->
  991:             ok
  992:     after
  993:         10000 ->
  994:             lager:info("Did not receive response!"),
  995:             ct:fail(failed)
  996:     end,
  997: 
  998:     lager:info("Finished awset_enforce_once_test."),
  999: 
 1000:     ok.
 1001: 
 1002: %% @doc Enforce once test.
 1003: awset_strict_enforce_once_test(Config) ->
 1004:     Manager = lasp_peer_service:manager(),
 1005:     lager:info("Manager: ~p", [Manager]),
 1006: 
 1007:     Nodes = proplists:get_value(nodes, Config),
 1008:     lager:info("Nodes: ~p", [Nodes]),
 1009:     Node = hd(lists:usort(Nodes)),
 1010: 
 1011:     lager:info("Waiting for cluster to stabilize."),
 1012:     timer:sleep(10000),
 1013: 
 1014:     %% Declare the object first: if not, invariant can't be registered.
 1015:     Id = {<<"object">>, ?AWSET_TYPE},
 1016:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, declare, [Id, ?AWSET_TYPE]),
 1017: 
 1018:     %% Define an enforce-once invariant.
 1019:     Self = self(),
 1020:     Threshold = {strict, {cardinality, 1}},
 1021: 
 1022:     EnforceFun = fun(X) ->
 1023:                          lager:info("Enforce function fired with: ~p", [X]),
 1024:                          Self ! {ok, Threshold}
 1025:                  end,
 1026: 
 1027:     lager:info("Adding invariant on node: ~p!", [Node]),
 1028: 
 1029:     case rpc:call(Node, lasp, enforce_once, [Id, Threshold, EnforceFun]) of
 1030:         ok ->
 1031:             lager:info("Invariant configured!");
 1032:         Error ->
 1033:             lager:info("Invariant can't be configured: ~p", [Error]),
 1034:             ct:fail(failed)
 1035:     end,
 1036: 
 1037:     %% Increment counter twice to get trigger to fire.
 1038:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, update, [Id, {add, 1}, self()]),
 1039:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, update, [Id, {add, 2}, self()]),
 1040:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, update, [Id, {add, 3}, self()]),
 1041: 
 1042:     lager:info("Waiting for response..."),
 1043:     receive
 1044:         {ok, Threshold} ->
 1045:             ok
 1046:     after
 1047:         10000 ->
 1048:             lager:info("Did not receive response!"),
 1049:             ct:fail(failed)
 1050:     end,
 1051: 
 1052:     lager:info("Finished awset_strict_enforce_once_test."),
 1053: 
 1054:     ok.
 1055: 
 1056: %% @doc Enforce once test.
 1057: orset_enforce_once_test(Config) ->
 1058:     Manager = lasp_peer_service:manager(),
 1059:     lager:info("Manager: ~p", [Manager]),
 1060: 
 1061:     Nodes = proplists:get_value(nodes, Config),
 1062:     lager:info("Nodes: ~p", [Nodes]),
 1063:     Node = hd(lists:usort(Nodes)),
 1064: 
 1065:     lager:info("Waiting for cluster to stabilize."),
 1066:     timer:sleep(10000),
 1067: 
 1068:     %% Declare the object first: if not, invariant can't be registered.
 1069:     Id = {<<"object">>, ?SET},
 1070:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, declare, [Id, ?SET]),
 1071: 
 1072:     %% Define an enforce-once invariant.
 1073:     Self = self(),
 1074:     Threshold = {cardinality, 1},
 1075: 
 1076:     EnforceFun = fun(X) ->
 1077:                          lager:info("Enforce function fired with: ~p", [X]),
 1078:                          Self ! {ok, Threshold}
 1079:                  end,
 1080: 
 1081:     lager:info("Adding invariant on node: ~p!", [Node]),
 1082: 
 1083:     case rpc:call(Node, lasp, enforce_once, [Id, Threshold, EnforceFun]) of
 1084:         ok ->
 1085:             lager:info("Invariant configured!");
 1086:         Error ->
 1087:             lager:info("Invariant can't be configured: ~p", [Error]),
 1088:             ct:fail(failed)
 1089:     end,
 1090: 
 1091:     %% Increment counter twice to get trigger to fire.
 1092:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, update, [Id, {add, 1}, self()]),
 1093:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, update, [Id, {add, 2}, self()]),
 1094:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, update, [Id, {add, 3}, self()]),
 1095: 
 1096:     lager:info("Waiting for response..."),
 1097:     receive
 1098:         {ok, Threshold} ->
 1099:             ok
 1100:     after
 1101:         10000 ->
 1102:             lager:info("Did not receive response!"),
 1103:             ct:fail(failed)
 1104:     end,
 1105: 
 1106:     lager:info("Finished orset_enforce_once_test."),
 1107: 
 1108:     ok.
 1109: 
 1110: %% @doc Enforce once test.
 1111: orset_strict_enforce_once_test(Config) ->
 1112:     Manager = lasp_peer_service:manager(),
 1113:     lager:info("Manager: ~p", [Manager]),
 1114: 
 1115:     Nodes = proplists:get_value(nodes, Config),
 1116:     lager:info("Nodes: ~p", [Nodes]),
 1117:     Node = hd(lists:usort(Nodes)),
 1118: 
 1119:     lager:info("Waiting for cluster to stabilize."),
 1120:     timer:sleep(10000),
 1121: 
 1122:     %% Declare the object first: if not, invariant can't be registered.
 1123:     Id = {<<"object">>, ?SET},
 1124:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, declare, [Id, ?SET]),
 1125: 
 1126:     %% Define an enforce-once invariant.
 1127:     Self = self(),
 1128:     Threshold = {strict, {cardinality, 1}},
 1129: 
 1130:     EnforceFun = fun(X) ->
 1131:                          lager:info("Enforce function fired with: ~p", [X]),
 1132:                          Self ! {ok, Threshold}
 1133:                  end,
 1134: 
 1135:     lager:info("Adding invariant on node: ~p!", [Node]),
 1136: 
 1137:     case rpc:call(Node, lasp, enforce_once, [Id, Threshold, EnforceFun]) of
 1138:         ok ->
 1139:             lager:info("Invariant configured!");
 1140:         Error ->
 1141:             lager:info("Invariant can't be configured: ~p", [Error]),
 1142:             ct:fail(failed)
 1143:     end,
 1144: 
 1145:     %% Increment counter twice to get trigger to fire.
 1146:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, update, [Id, {add, 1}, self()]),
 1147:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, update, [Id, {add, 2}, self()]),
 1148:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, update, [Id, {add, 3}, self()]),
 1149: 
 1150:     lager:info("Waiting for response..."),
 1151:     receive
 1152:         {ok, Threshold} ->
 1153:             ok
 1154:     after
 1155:         10000 ->
 1156:             lager:info("Did not receive response!"),
 1157:             ct:fail(failed)
 1158:     end,
 1159: 
 1160:     lager:info("Finished orset_strict_enforce_once_test."),
 1161: 
 1162:     ok.
 1163: 
 1164: %% @doc Membership test.
 1165: membership_test(Config) ->
 1166:     Manager = lasp_peer_service:manager(),
 1167:     ct:pal("Manager: ~p", [Manager]),
 1168: 
 1169:     Nodes = proplists:get_value(nodes, Config),
 1170:     lager:info("Nodes: ~p", [Nodes]),
 1171:     Sorted = lists:usort(Nodes),
 1172: 
 1173:     lager:info("Waiting for cluster to stabilize."),
 1174:     timer:sleep(10000),
 1175: 
 1176:     case Manager of
 1177:         partisan_hyparview_peer_service_manager ->
 1178:             lists:foreach(fun(Node) ->
 1179:                                 {ok, Active} = rpc:call(Node, Manager, active, []),
 1180:                                 {ok, Passive} = rpc:call(Node, Manager, passive, []),
 1181: 
 1182:                                 case lists:usort([Name || {Name, _, _} <- sets:to_list(Active)]) of
 1183:                                     Sorted ->
 1184:                                         ok;
 1185:                                     WrongActive ->
 1186:                                         ct:fail("Incorrect nodes in active view on node ~p: ~p should be ~p!",
 1187:                                                 [Node, WrongActive, Sorted])
 1188:                                 end,
 1189: 
 1190:                                 case sets:to_list(Passive) of
 1191:                                     [] ->
 1192:                                         ok;
 1193:                                     WrongPassive ->
 1194:                                         ct:fail("Incorrect nodes in passive view: ~p!",
 1195:                                                 [WrongPassive])
 1196:                                 end
 1197:                           end, Nodes);
 1198:         partisan_pluggable_peer_service_manager ->
 1199:             lists:foreach(fun(Node) ->
 1200:                                 {ok, Members} = rpc:call(Node, Manager, members, []),
 1201:                                 lists:usort(Members) =:= lists:usort(Nodes)
 1202:                           end, Nodes);
 1203:         partisan_client_server_peer_service_manager ->
 1204:             lists:foreach(fun(Node) ->
 1205:                                 {ok, Members} = rpc:call(Node, Manager, members, []),
 1206:                                 lists:usort(Members) =:= lists:usort(Nodes)
 1207:                           end, Nodes)
 1208:     end,
 1209: 
 1210:     ok.
 1211: 
 1212: %% @doc Test of the add-wins set.
 1213: awset_ps_test(_Config) ->
 1214:     {ok, {L1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?AWSET_PS),
 1215:     {ok, {L2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?AWSET_PS),
 1216:     {ok, {L3, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?AWSET_PS),
 1217: 
 1218:     %% Attempt pre, and post- dataflow variable bind operations.
 1219:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:bind_to(L2, L1)),
 1220:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2}} = lasp:update(L1, {add, 1}, a),
 1221:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:bind_to(L3, L1)),
 1222: 
 1223:     timer:sleep(4000),
 1224: 
 1225:     %% Verify the same value is contained by all.
 1226:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1}} = lasp:read(L3, {strict, undefined}),
 1227:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1}} = lasp:read(L2, {strict, undefined}),
 1228:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1}} = lasp:read(L1, {strict, undefined}),
 1229: 
 1230:     Self = self(),
 1231: 
 1232:     spawn_link(fun() ->
 1233:                   {ok, _} = lasp:wait_needed(L1, {strict, S1}),
 1234:                   Self ! threshold_met
 1235:                end),
 1236: 
 1237:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:bind(L1, S2)),
 1238: 
 1239:     timer:sleep(4000),
 1240: 
 1241:     %% Verify the same value is contained by all.
 1242:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2L3}} = lasp:read(L3, {strict, undefined}),
 1243:     ?assertEqual(S2L3, lasp_type:merge(?AWSET_PS, S2, S2L3)),
 1244:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2L2}} = lasp:read(L2, {strict, undefined}),
 1245:     ?assertEqual(S2L2, lasp_type:merge(?AWSET_PS, S2, S2L2)),
 1246:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2L1}} = lasp:read(L1, {strict, undefined}),
 1247:     ?assertEqual(S2L1, lasp_type:merge(?AWSET_PS, S2, S2L1)),
 1248: 
 1249:     %% Read at the S2 threshold level.
 1250:     {ok, {_, _, _, _}} = lasp:read(L1, S2),
 1251: 
 1252:     %% Wait for wait_needed to unblock.
 1253:     receive
 1254:         threshold_met ->
 1255:             ok
 1256:     end,
 1257: 
 1258:     {ok, {L5, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?AWSET_PS),
 1259:     {ok, {L6, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?AWSET_PS),
 1260: 
 1261:     spawn_link(fun() ->
 1262:                 {ok, _} = lasp:read_any([{L5, {strict, undefined}}, {L6, {strict, undefined}}]),
 1263:                 Self ! read_any
 1264:         end),
 1265: 
 1266:     {ok, _} = lasp:update(L5, {add, 1}, a),
 1267: 
 1268:     receive
 1269:         read_any ->
 1270:             ok
 1271:     end.
